comprehensive_overview: lazygit is a simple terminal UI for git commands, with the ability to easily view and manage changes in repositories.
core_features: Intuitive and easy-to-use terminal UI for git commands
Visual representation of git status, changes, commits, and branches
Interactive interface for staging, unstaging, committing, and managing changes
Support for common git operations such as pull, push, merge, and rebase
Ability to resolve merge conflicts and perform basic git actions seamlessly
